frameworkGroups.title: Core Frameworks - Geospatial
frameworkGroups.description: The famous vis.gl frameworks for geospatial visualization and analytics on the web.

entries.name: kepler.gl
entries.description: kepler.gl is a widely used geospatial tool for interactive exploration of geospatial data using deck.gl. Also, the kepler.gl application framework enables custom geospatial applications.

entries.name: deck.gl
entries.description: High-performance, GPU powered visualization layers for large scale geospatial data. Submodules provide layers for various geospatial and 3D  use cases.

entries.name: loaders.gl
entries.description: Optimized, framework-independent loaders for geospatial, tabular and 3D file formats. Supports worker-based, binary data loading.

entries.name: pydeck.gl
entries.description: Python bindings for deck.gl that enable custom geospatial visualizations to be programmed directly in Jupyter Notebooks.

entries.name: react-map-gl
entries.description: A React wrapper for Maplibra and Mapbox GL JS that integrates with deck.gl.

entries.name: react-google-maps
entries.description: A React wrapper for the Google Maps JavaScript API that integrates with deck.gl.

entries.name: hubble.gl
entries.description: A powerful animation and video capture solution for deck.gl and kepler.gl visualizations.

entries.name: flowmap.gl
entries.description: A powerful flow map drawing layer for deck.gl. For visualization of geographic movement: mobility, transportation, migration, etc.

frameworkGroups.title: Community Frameworks - Geospatial
frameworkGroups.description: A number of community-maintained, "non-official" vis.gl frameworks under open governance. Offering layers, basemaps, add-on modules for deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/editable-layers
entries.description: High-performance feature editing layers for deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/leaflet
entries.description: Unofficial basemap add-on module for deck.gl.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/bing-maps
entries.description: Unofficial basemap add-on module for deck.gl.

frameworkGroups.title: Core Frameworks - Common
frameworkGroups.description: The core vis.gl frameworks are designed to be independently usable while working seamlessly together. Developers select composable components such as loaders, visualization layers, and math modules, and combine them to quickly achieve desired results.

entries.name: luma.gl
entries.description: A WebGPU and WebGL2 library for high-performance visualization and GPU computation on the web.

entries.name: math.gl
entries.description: Math library focusing on 3D and geospatial math.

entries.name: probe.gl
entries.description: JavaScript Console Logging, Instrumentation, Benchmarking and Test Utilities.

frameworkGroups.title: Community Frameworks - Infovis (Non-Geospatial)
frameworkGroups.description: While Geospatial is a main driver of deck.gl development, non-geospatial use cases are on the rise.

entries.name: deck.gl-community/graph-layers
entries.description: A set of graph-layers for deck.gl including GPU powered layout algorithms.

frameworkGroups.title: Related Frameworks
frameworkGroups.description: The vis.gl framework suite deeply integrates with certain open source frameworks that are not under the OpenJS Open Visualization umbrella.
